description: Stylesheet defining CSS variables for theme management and styling of the App component in a React application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application component styles including text alignment, background color, and transitions.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the logo image in the application.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styles for the main application which includes layout and color transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links in the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button including position, appearance, and hover effects.
